00083   void Set(File* filePtr, PageId pageNum)
00084   { 
00085     file = filePtr;
00086     pageNo = pageNum;
00087     pinCnt = 1;
00088     dirty = false;
00089     valid = true;
00090     refbit = true;
00091   }
00092 
00093   void Print()
00094   {
00095     if(file)
00096     {
00097       std::cout << "file:" << file->filename() << " ";
00098       std::cout << "pageNo:" << pageNo << " ";
00099     }
00100     else
00101       std::cout << "file:NULL ";
00102 
00103     std::cout << "valid:" << valid << " ";
00104     std::cout << "pinCnt:" << pinCnt << " ";
00105     std::cout << "dirty:" << dirty << " ";
00106     std::cout << "refbit:" << refbit << "\n";
00107   }
00108

00113   {
00114     Clear();
00115   }
